name: image-stitch
description: Stitch images together efficiently, support streaming, for node.js and web

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:bundles
scripts.build:browser-test: tsc tests/browser.test.ts --outDir build/browser-tests --module ES2022 --target ES2022 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:memory-test: tsc tests/memory.test.ts --outDir build/memory-tests --module ES2022 --target ES2022 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --skipLibCheck
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build:tests && node --expose-gc --test build/tests/*.test.js
scripts.test:memory: npm run build && npm run build:memory-test && node --expose-gc --test build/memory-tests/tests/memory.test.js
scripts.test:browser: npm run build:docs && npm run build:browser-test && node --expose-gc --test build/browser-tests/browser.test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:memory && npm run test:browser
scripts.smoke: npm run smoke:esm && npm run smoke:cjs
scripts.coverage: npm run build && npm run build:tests && c8 --reporter=lcov --reporter=text node --expose-gc --test build/tests/*.test.js
